General.Name: Pioneer Motor Public Company Limited
General.Description: Pioneer Motor Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiary, VSM (Thailand) Co., Ltd., engages in manufacturing and distributing of electric motors in Thailand. The company offers air-conditioning motors, industrial motors, dewatering and centrifugal pumps, pool motors, and submersible pumps, as well as spas and motor home pumps. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Nakhon Pathom, Thailand.

1.Name: Ms. Pojaman  Wongsuwan
1.Title: Deputy MD of Accounting & Fin. and Director
